title: Audit the Ethics Hotline Process
description: An auditor reviews the process for handling reports made to the company's ethics hotline.

tasks.description: Obtain the log of all cases reported to the ethics hotline in the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the case management log.

tasks.description: Select a sample of cases to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: A sample is selected for testing.

tasks.description: For each sampled case, review the investigation file to ensure that the issue was investigated thoroughly, documented properly, and resolved in a timely manner.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that all sampled cases were handled in accordance with the investigation protocol.
